page.title: 02Homes in Bransgore
page.content: The{cottages}in Bransgore are mostly thatched but quite a few are tiled. They have diamond-paned windows and old fashioned front doors. The cottages usually have large gardens. The{modern estate houses}have small gardens but the houses make up for this by being modern inside eg. with en-suite shower rooms and modern kitchens. {Semi-detached houses}are found either on small estates or on council estates. These houses are usually small with small gardens. They are not usually as nice as the modern detached houses. The only block of{flats}in Bransgore is Bransgore House which was a mansion, converted into flats in 1960. The{Bungalows}are ideal for the elderly as they have no stairs.
